languages.text: "Там, где азуриани радуются сходству, вы находите лишь горечь. Я никогда не пойму вашего стремления быть разобщенными".

traits.locale_text: "Там, где азуриани радуются сходству, вы находите лишь горечь. Я никогда не пойму вашего стремления быть разобщенными".

languages.text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."
languages.original_text: "Там, где азуриани радуются сходству, вы находите лишь горечь. Я никогда не пойму вашего стремления быть разобщенными".

traits.locale_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's desire to be disparate."
"Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's desire to be disparate."
"Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."
"Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."
"Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."
"Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."

languages.text: 「アシュリヤーニが類似性の中に満足を見いだすところで、お前はただ苦々しさしか感じない。お前たちの種族がつながりを嫌う理由は、私には決して理解できない」
languages.original_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリヤーニが類似性の中に満足を見いだすところで、お前はただ苦々しさしか感じない。お前たちの種族がつながりを嫌う理由は、私には決して理解できない」

languages.text: "Ein Asuryani empfindet bei einer Ähnlichkeit Genugtuung, Ihr dagegen nur Verbitterung. Ich werde nie verstehen, warum Euer Volk Verbindungen gegenüber so abgeneigt ist."
languages.original_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Asuryani empfindet bei einer Ähnlichkeit Genugtuung, Ihr dagegen nur Verbitterung. Ich werde nie verstehen, warum Euer Volk Verbindungen gegenüber so abgeneigt ist."

languages.text: « Alors que les Asuryanis trouvent la similarité gratifiante, elle ne vous inspire que de l'amertume. Je ne comprendrai jamais pourquoi votre espèce répugne tant à créer des liens. »
languages.original_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."

traits.locale_text: « Alors que les Asuryanis trouvent la similarité gratifiante, elle ne vous inspire que de l'amertume. Je ne comprendrai jamais pourquoi votre espèce répugne tant à créer des liens. »

languages.text: «Donde un asuryani hallaría gratificación en la semejanza, tú solo sientes resentimiento. Jamás entenderé la aversión que siente tu especie por conectar con otros».
languages.original_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."

traits.locale_text: «Donde un asuryani hallaría gratificación en la semejanza, tú solo sientes resentimiento. Jamás entenderé la aversión que siente tu especie por conectar con otros».

languages.text: “方舟灵族会在彼此的相似之处中发现喜悦，而你们只会满心怨恨。我恐怕永远理解不了你们为什么这么忌讳彼此之间的联系。”
languages.original_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."

traits.locale_text: “方舟灵族会在彼此的相似之处中发现喜悦，而你们只会满心怨恨。我恐怕永远理解不了你们为什么这么忌讳彼此之间的联系。”

languages.text: "Bir Asuryani'nin en ufak benzerlikle tatmin olduğu yerde sen şer buluyorsun. Türünün bağlanmaya karşı nefretini asla anlamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Asuryani'nin en ufak benzerlikle tatmin olduğu yerde sen şer buluyorsun. Türünün bağlanmaya karşı nefretini asla anlamıyorum."

languages.original_text: "Where an Asuryani finds gratification in resemblance, you find only bitterness. I will never understand your kind's aversion to connection."
